bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to G.W. McCoy, December 8, 1924

div1.p: Carter requests books on the voyages of exploration from the Library of Congress.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to G.W. McCoy, December 8, 1924
div1.opener:
Hygienic Laboratory
RECEIVED
DEC 12 1924
Miss Myers.
2122 California St. N. W
Washington D. C.
Dec 8/24
Dear Doctor McCoy:
div1.p:
The books you were so kind as to
send me some days ago are redy for
return to the Congressional Library.

When this is done I will be glad if you
could get for me the books named
belowviz.
1) Vol 16 of "A general Collection of Travels and
Voyages, by John Pinkerton.
2) No 1 Hakluyt Society's Publications (1st series)
“Sir Rich'd Hawkins Observations etc”
3) No 57 Hakluyt Society's Publications (1st series)
The Hawkins' Voyages etc - Sir Clement Markham,
incirculation
Library Congress
4
4) No 95. Hakluyt Society's Publications (1st series)
Sond
Eannes de Azugar a.g. Chronicle of the
Discovery & Conquest of Guinea.

There is no hurry about these as I have enough
to occupy me - all of this week. I think
